definitions.definition: A piece of computer music in which the sounds are generated and mixed in realtime , common before the advent of mass storage for prerecorded sound.

A style of music that samples or emulates the audio capabilities of older sound chips , but ignores certain hardware or software limitations inherent to them; especially ( demoscene ) a tracker module simulating the sound of early 8-bit computers.

main_definition: ( music ) A piece of computer music in which the sounds are generated and mixed in realtime , common before the advent of mass storage for prerecorded sound.
